question:
The average (arithmetic mean) weight of 4 people is 85 kilograms. Two of the people weigh 75 and 90 kilograms, respectively.
Quantity A
Quantity B
The average (arithmetic mean) weight of the other two people, in kilograms
85 kilograms
A) Quantity A is greater.
B) Quantity B is greater.
C) The two quantities are equal.
D) The relationship cannot be determined from the information given.
